name: Canadian Canine Tundra Booties (Pair)
description: Protect your dog’s paws from everything winter brings with it. The Tundra neoprene boot keeps your dog’s paws warm and shields them from road salt and other chemicals. The soft neoprene is warm and ensures a comfortable fit, while the hook-and-loop fastening keeps the boot securely on the paw.Provides protection from extreme temperatures and salt.Secure hook-and-loop closure.Weather-resistant.Warm and comfortable.Reflective details.Anti-slip sole.
